description: Greater Masterwort (Astrantia 'Superstar') is an amazing plant species that is both beautiful and easy to grow. It has dark, glossy, attractive foliage with pale veins, and produces gorgeous, rose-like heads of flowers from late summer into autumn. Its common name reflects the majestic, star-shaped flowers that make a stunning display. It provides essential nectar for pollinators and grows best in semi-shade positions, adding an elegant touch to gardens and landscapes. This plant is also drought-tolerant and deer-resistant, making it an excellent addition to any garden.
